description: Rina is Rio`s childhood friend who had been recuited by Tom as a dealer. Her mother was hospitalised and her father was fequently away on business trips when she was a child, and therefore was raised by Risa and Rio, the latter whom she treated like a sister. She has a mysterious energy that makes her customers weary, as opposed to Rio`s aura which gives her customers energy.
name: Rina Goldschmidt Tachibana
